meta.description: Learn why StudyPilot was built and the values behind the platform.
meta.title: About StudyPilot

cta.title: Ready to upgrade your study routine?

developer.p1: Hi there! I'm Lewis. With 8 years of experience teaching UQ CSSE1001/7030 and 5 years for INFS3202/7202 and COMP3506/7505, I've seen firsthand where students struggle most.
developer.p2: It all started when I realized students simply didn't have enough practice problems. I began by hand-picking 100 extra questions for CSSE1001/7030; today, that collection has evolved into a massive database of 500+ problems. I'm also excited to announce that our dedicated question banks for INFS3202/7202 and COMP3506/7505 are officially ready for launch!
developer.p3: Whether you're in a time crunch or aiming for that perfect Grade 7, this platform is built to help you bridge the gap and crush your academic goals. Let's get to work!
developer.title: Meet the Developer

hero.subtitle: Building the intelligent study companion I wish I had.
hero.title: About StudyPilot

inspiration.leadPrefix: It started with a simple frustration:
inspiration.leadStrong: Static PDF past papers just aren't enough.
inspiration.newWayDescription: Interactive question banks, instant feedback, and smart analytics that tell you exactly what to focus on.
inspiration.oldWayDescription: Endlessly scrolling through PDFs, guessing answers, and having no way to track what you've actually mastered.
inspiration.title: The Spark of Inspiration

access.description: High-quality exam preparation should be available to everyone. We're committed to keeping our core resources accessible.
access.title: Accessible Education

mastery.description: We believe in quality over quantity. Our spaced repetition system ensures you don't just memorize, but truly master the concepts.
mastery.title: Mastery First

student.description: Every feature is built with direct feedback from students. We solve real study challenges, not hypothetical ones.
student.title: Student Centric

values.subtitle: What drives every feature we build.
values.title: Our Core Values

hero.subtitle: Have a question about StudyPilot or just want to say hello? We're here to help you every step of the way.

wechat.title: WeChat Community

items.answer: StudyPilot is an exam practice platform designed for university students. It offers curated question banks from past exams, spaced repetition flashcards, and smart mistake tracking to help you study more effectively.
items.question: What is StudyPilot?

items.answer: Our question banks contain thousands of practice questions organized by subject and topic. Each question includes detailed explanations to help you learn.
items.question: How does the Question Bank work?

items.answer: Spaced repetition is a scientifically-proven learning technique that schedules reviews at optimal intervals to maximize long-term retention. StudyPilot's flashcard system automatically determines when you should review each card.
items.question: What is Spaced Repetition?

items.answer: Yes! StudyPilot offers a free tier that includes access to selected question banks and basic features. Premium features like unlimited question banks are available with a subscription.
items.question: Is StudyPilot free to use?

items.answer: StudyPilot currently supports courses from the University of Queensland, including CSSE1001, CSSE7030, COMP3506, INFS3202, and more. We're constantly adding new courses.
items.question: Which courses are supported?

items.answer: Absolutely! StudyPilot provides detailed analytics including accuracy rates by topic, time spent studying, improvement trends, and a knowledge radar that visualizes your strengths and weaknesses.
items.question: Can I track my progress?

items.answer: If you find an error in any question or answer, you can use the feedback button on the question page to report it. Our team reviews all submissions regularly.
items.question: How do I report an error?

meta.description: Find answers to common questions about StudyPilot - the exam practice platform.
meta.title: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions | StudyPilot

page.subtitle: Everything you need to know about StudyPilot. Can't find your answer?
page.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.answer: StudyPilot is an exam practice platform with 1000+ curated questions, mock exams, and curated question banks designed for university students. StudyPilot currently supports courses from the University of Queensland including CSSE1001, CSSE7030, COMP3506, INFS3202, INFS7202 and more.
items.question: What is StudyPilot?

items.answer: A Question Bank is a focused collection of curated questions for a topic or skill area. It is designed for targeted drilling with flexible practice modes, so you can train weak spots efficiently.
items.question: What is a Question Bank?

items.answer: A Mock Exam is a timed, full-length exam simulation. It helps you practice pacing, stamina, and decision-making under realistic exam conditions.
items.question: What is a Mock Exam?

items.answer: Homework includes assigned sets (published by staff/admin), often with deadlines and progress tracking. You can find and complete your assigned homework from your Profile.
items.question: How does Homework work?

items.answer: StudyPilot uses organized question banks from past exams and scientifically-proven spaced repetition to help students master course material efficiently.
items.question: How does StudyPilot help with exam preparation?

items.answer: StudyPilot currently supports courses from the University of Queensland including CSSE1001, CSSE7030, COMP3506, INFS3202, INFS7202 and more.
items.question: Which universities and courses are supported?

items.answer: Our pricing is already optimized for students. The Lifetime Access plan is priced to be affordable for a student budget, equivalent to the cost of a few coffees.
items.question: Do you offer student discounts?

items.answer: StudyPilot is still in its early testing phase. For any payment-related questions, please contact our team.
items.question: What payment methods do you accept?

items.answer: Once the early bird promotion ends, correct pricing will revert to the regular price. We recommend locking in the lifetime deal now to save over 80%.
items.question: What happens after the early bird promotion ends?
